name: VViViD+ Ultra Gloss Candy Purple Vinyl Car Wrap Premium Paint Replacement Film Roll with Nano Air Release Technology, Stretchable Protective Cap Liner, Self Adhesive (50ft x 5ft)
short_description: Most Realistic Paint-Replacement: VViViD Vinyls presents the newest evolution in vinyl wrap technology. Our Ultra Gloss range is the result of years of research and development, culminating in an almost mirror-like Gloss that is virtually indistinguishable from a factory paint job.

Premium Features: To achieve the Ultra Gloss look, VViViD re-designed every aspect of car-wrap vinyl from the ground up. The result is a range of films packed with new technologies to create a stunningly beautiful finish. Conventional vinyl wraps can look good, but Ultra Gloss takes it to the next level.

Nano Air-Release Technology: Air-release channels built into vinyl adhesive can sometimes create irregularities in the surface, making for a less glossy finish. VViViD’s Ultra Gloss films are the only vinyls that utilize a micro air-release pattern so finely engineered that the result is an almost glass-like finish.

Stretchable Protective Cap: Unlike other vinyls, VViViD’s Ultra Gloss comes with a protective film that stretches with the vinyl, so you don’t have to remove that protective layer until the installation is complete, reducing the risk of scratches and scuffs.

VViViD Ultra Gloss vinyls are ready to use right out of the box, no liquids or messy, toxic chemicals needed. For the car enthusiast who demands next-level refinement, with beautiful colors and textures, look no further. Please note that due to specific procedures in hand-rolling and hand-cutting our vinyl wrap product, a ±1 inch discrepancy may occur.

name: Auto Accessories 5D Glossy Carbon Fiber Wrap Vinyl Film Car Interior Wrap Stickers, Car DIY Interior Exterior (12 * 60inch) (US Stock)
short_description: DIY: Gloss Black carbon fiber car vinyl wrap is specially engineered for DIY'ers. This Carbon Fiber film is ideal for long-trip fleet and motor-sport marketing applications, for a hyper-realistic carbon fiber look!

Application for: Interior or Exterior of Automobile parts such as: Dashboard, Steering wheel, interior door handles, Glove compartments, car control panel, Fenders, Door handles, tire rims, exhaust pipes, ect.
Eco-friendly "paint": This durable film is ideal for long-term fleet and motorsport marketing applications, and provides a lightweight, economical alternative to paint!

If you notice the sticker is curled and wrinkled, please be careful , the sticker can be recovery as the below step:1. Clean paste position; 2. Move away the bottom paper on the back; 3. Adjust the position and paste; 4. Use a hair dryer to heat the wrinkled and curled place of the car sticker, then use the scraper to flatten the sticker and remove air bubbles. 5. Move away the transfer film carefully; 6. Finish. Don't wash your car in 3 days.
Any questions please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve it.

name: VViViD Snow Camouflage Vinyl Car Wrap Adhesive DIY Air Release Roll (1.5ft x 5ft)
short_description: VVIVID Camouflage vinyls lend an authentic military Camouflage appearance to any surface, whilst adding a layer of tough, durable weather-proof protection. Perfect for blending into the surroundings during hunting season, but also stylish and attractive all year round.
VViViD car wrap films conform to contours and can stretch up to 200% (30% or less is suggested for optimal performance), making installation a simple process, even for beginners.
Can be easily applied to any non-porous surface with only a heat gun and squeegee. Easily repositioned or removed with no risk of chipping factory paint.
VVIVID vinyls feature air channel release technology, allowing you to smooth it onto a surface and eliminate air bubbles for a perfect finish.
Installs in a fraction of the time it would take to apply a new paint job, and at a fraction of the price. Long life span, up to 10 years indoor and 5-7 years outdoor

name: LZLRUN Premium Glossy Liquid Metal Red Vinyl Wrap Sticker for Car DIY Self Adhesive Decal Super Gloss Blood Red Wrap Film (1ft × 5ft)
short_description: Durable Material : Ultra glossy liquid metal blood red vinyl, high flexible Vinyl film . Durable, waterproof, stain-resistant, abrasion-resistant, scratch-resistant and not easy to tear. Superior quality and good looking and functional .

Advantage : The Glossy Red vinyl film is self-adhesive and removable. It doesn't easily discolored , cracking , peeling for long-lasting designs . When you want to change to another sticker, it can be quickly removed without residual glue . It feels very smooth to the touch . Indoor life span 7-8 years and outdoor life span 3-5 years .
Application : The Glossy Red vinyl film is durable ,waterproof , high adhesion, not easy to fade and peel. Suitable for car , motorcycle ,SUV and bike .

Installation Tips : Firstly, clean the surface before installing the vinyl film, this will help with adhesion and remove contaminants that may cause blemishes. Secondly, using a heat gun will aid installation by making the vinyl more pliable and will also help remove wrinkles. Thirdly , using a soft rubber squeegee will help eliminate bubbles and creases. Lastly, once installation is complete, avoid washing your car and getting wet for three days.
